page.title: 13 Child's Clothing,W.Stafford
page.content:
A School uniform in 1985 is a blouse or shirt,tie,skirt or trousers, pullover,shoes and socks. Blouse/shirt:-cotton clothing which buttons up the front. Tie :-strip of material,the colour represents the school. Skirt :-Fastens at the back,starts at the waist,ends at the knees. Trousers:-piece of clothing which covers both legs separately. Pullover:-woollen overall. Shoes :-protection for the feet. Socks :-worn on feet inside shoes.
A child's casual wear in 1985 is a T-shirt or blouse,trousers or skirt or shorts,socks,shoes or trainers T-shirt :-short sleeved cotton top. Trainers:-comfortable leisure shoes.
